featured.text: The author’s primary purpose in this passage is to __________.
What is the primary goal of 100% Fish? (A)
Mr. Power then spoke with his own primary care doctor, who advised him to find a new specialist to oversee Mrs. Power’s care.
his primary school classmate Mary until he listened to her self-introduction.

definition.en_def: First in order of importance or development.
definition.example: The primary goal of the project is to improve community health.
